response_parsed.summary: This guide will walk you through creating an event-driven system using FastAPI, a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.

Learn how to structure an application using FastAPI's routing system and dependencies.
Explore handling HTTP requests using FastAPI's built-in features, such as Middlewares and Background Tasks.
Implement event listeners for custom events or third-party libraries like starlette-events.
Understand how to integrate with external services like databases or message brokers in an event-driven manner.
